SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.util

Class CustomLog

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.util.CustomLog
public class CustomLog extends Object
Replaces the primitive functionality of the standard CloudSim Log. Allows easily to redirect log to a file, and to customize the output.
Before using this class remember to call the
invalid reference 
CustomLog.configLogger
with the desired Properties, or with an empty Properties if you want to use the defaults. The documentation of the public String constants of the class describes what keys and values can be specified.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
Author:
Nikolay Grozev Adapted from versions of:
  1. Anton Beloglazov
  2. William Voorsluys
  3. Adel Nadjaran Toosi

  • Field Details

    • LOG_LEVEL_PROP_KEY

      public static final String LOG_LEVEL_PROP_KEY
      A key for the config property specifying what is the minimal logged level. Must be a string of a constant from Level
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LOG_CLOUD_SIM_CLOCK_PROP_KEY

      public static final String LOG_CLOUD_SIM_CLOCK_PROP_KEY
      A key for a boolean property, specifying if every log entry should contain the current CloudSim time.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LOG_READABLE_CLOUD_SIM_CLOCK_PROP_KEY

      public static final String LOG_READABLE_CLOUD_SIM_CLOCK_PROP_KEY
      A key for a boolean property, specifying if every log entry should contain with the current CloudSim time in a readable format.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LOG_CLOUD_REAL_TIME_PROP_KEY

      public static final String LOG_CLOUD_REAL_TIME_PROP_KEY
      A key for a boolean property, specifying if every log entry should contain the current CloudSim time.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LOG_FORMAT_PROP_KEY

      public static final String LOG_FORMAT_PROP_KEY
      Specifies which methods of the LogRecord class should be used to create the log entries. Calls must be seprated with a semicolon ";". For example "getLevel;getMessage".
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_PATH_PROP_KEY

      public static final String FILE_PATH_PROP_KEY
      A key for a file property where the log is to be written. If not specified the standard output is used instead of a file.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SHUT_STANDART_LOGGER_PROP_KEY

      public static final String SHUT_STANDART_LOGGER_PROP_KEY
      A key for a boolean property specifying whether the standard CloudSim logger should be turned off. That will cause all the log generated by the system classes of CloudSim not to be printed.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_LEVEL

      public static final Level DEFAULT_LEVEL
      The default log level used by this log, if not specified.

      Parameters:
      klass - - the class to be used for the header. If null no header is printed.
      properties - - the properties to print.
      list - - list of objects. All objects, must be of type klass.

    • isDisabled

      public static boolean isDisabled()
      Returns if this logger is disabled.
      Returns:
      - if this logger is disabled.

    • setOutput

      public static void setOutput(OutputStream output)
      Sets the output of this logger. This method is to be used for redirecting to "nonstandard" (e.g. database) output streams. If you simply want to redirect the logger to a file, you'd better use the initialization properties.
      Parameters:
      output - - the new output. Must not be null.

    • configLogger

      public static void configLogger(Properties props) throws SecurityException, IOException
      Configures the logger. Must be called before the logger is used.
      Parameters:
      props - - the configuration properties. See the predefined keys in this class, to get an idea of what is required.
      Throws:
      SecurityException - - if the specified log format contains invalid method calls.
      IOException - - if something goes wrong with the I/O.

    • redirectToFile

      public static void redirectToFile(String fileName)
      Redirects this logger to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - the name of the new log file. If null the log is redirected to the standard output.

    • redirectToFile

      public static void redirectToFile(String fileName, Boolean append)
      Redirects this logger to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - the name of the new log file. If null the log is redirected to the standard output.
      append - specifies append mode

    • redirectToConsole

      public static void redirectToConsole()
      Redirects this logger to the standard output.

    • closeAndRemoveHandlers

      public static void closeAndRemoveHandlers()
      Close and remove all file handlers. You should call this before exiting the program

    • flush

      public static void flush()
      Flushes the buffers, if any.
